detaileddescription.para: Handle to store the main Command processor handle to be reused by ServalPAL thread
OS thread handle for Application controller to be used by run-time blocking threads

briefdescription.para: Callback function called when interrupt occurs.
Gives control to the Application controller.

detaileddescription.para: This is a template function where the user can write his custom application.

briefdescription.para: To enable the necessary modules for the application.
This function controls the application flow.
To setup the necessary modules for the application.
Callback function called when interrupt occurs.
